Text:
The rooftop of Mitsugoshi is covered in darkness.
The small bell in Master Shadow's hand chimes.

Are you saying that this bell may help us find
the entryway, Master Cid?
Yeah, maybe.
That's splendid, Master Cid. Could you elaborate?
We're going to use this cat.
Th-The cat...?
Meooow.
There, there.

(And here I thought Master Shadow was also feeling
mushy being with the cat...)

Master Cid, are you going to take advantage of
such an adorable cat like that...?
Yeah...hmm?

We know that we must be ruthless sometimes
to destroy the Cult of Diablos.

However, when the time comes... Ugh...we have no
choice but to be ruthless, even if it means taking
the cat's life.

If it's your order, Master Cid, I'll be prepare
myself for the worst.
Huh? Just hold on a second.
Flustered, Master Shadow shakes his head.
I'm not going to do anything cruel.
Wait a minute. Here. Hold the cat.
Ah! O-Okay...
Meooow.

Oh no... When I hear a cat meow like this, I just
can't help myself.
Master Shadow pulls something out of his pocket.
Is that...a collar?
If I attach this bell to the collar...

You're tracking where the cat's going by the sound
of a bell...? Is your hearing so sharp that you can
hear a bell ringing from far away?!

Bravo, Master Cid. You have extraordinary abilities
that I could never attain.
No, no.

This collar has a tracking function, and it works in
tandem with this small compass. The needle points to
where the collar is.
...I see. And what's with the bell...?

Just something I like. Cats that have bells
on their collars are adorable, aren't they?
I-Indeed...

More importantly, this collar will help us track the
cat's location, and we can find the entryway it's
using!
That's exactly right.
I didn't expect you to have magic gear like this.
But it seems a bit large for a cat...
Ah...this is for humans.

It's not like that! You just thought of something
weird, didn't you?!

I never pictured you as the type to put something on
the neck of the woman of your dreams so that you'd
know where she is at all times!

But of course, if that's what your into, I have
nothing against it!
Okay, okay!
...I didn't want it, but it got forced on me.
Forgive me for asking, but who would force you to...
It was the person you were imagining, Nu.
It wouldn't be Eta, would it?
Yep, right on the money. You're good.
Contrarily, I couldn't think of anyone else but her.

Knowing Lady Eta, it's understandable that she'd
create that kind of magic gear.

If anything, it's easily imaginable seeing her give
this to Master Shadow with the biggest smile.

It was her idea to put it on me first. It was really
off-putting.

She wanted to know your location at all times...
It makes total sense that she'd think that way.
I guess you're convinced...
I just didn't think it'd come in handy here.

Master Shadow put the collar on the cat...but it
seems to be too loose, as it's meant for humans.
Meooow.
It's designed for humans, so that's why it's loose.
Meooow.
I've tightened it a lot, but it's still too big.

...Well, as long as it doesn't come off, that's all
that matters.
Meooow.

The cat doesn't seem to mind, and it's unlikely
that it'll remove it by itself.
True.

The compass is pointing toward the cat. Looks like
it's working just fine.

He sets the cat down, and it starts playing around
his feet. It likely doesn't know what's in store for it.
Meooow.

It's so cute it hurts... Let's leave for now, Master
Cid. It doesn't seem to be going anywhere for now.
Sure. Sounds good.
I wonder if it'll ever move.
It probably will. Cats are active at night.
You're right, Master Cid...!

After quietly waiting on the cat, it finally seems
to make its move.
Let's follow it.

The cat traverses narrow alleys difficult for humans,
and they follow it with the compass.
It seems to have entered an alley three blocks away.
Right. The needle is pointing that way.
The cat hides by some cargo, but is still visible.
...The cat stopped.
You're right.
It's sitting still. I wonder what it's waiting for.
It might be waiting for someone to come.
Ah! That could definitely be true.

It might not go anywhere if it notices us.
Can you make us disappear?
S-Sure...

(Although it's just to hide ourselves, I can't
believe I'm this close to Master Shadow...)

(I shouldn't be...but I'm so nervous. I have to
stay calm and get us out of sight...!)

The more she tries to act composed, the more she
becomes aware of his presence.
(Maybe I should step aside for a moment.)
M-Master Cid—
Shh!
Meooow.

Someone has come into the alley. Their shadow gets
closer to the cat.

(I wonder who it is. Oh...I can almost make them
out clearly. Just a bit more...)
